content: Which American author's story, The Fall of the House of Usher, has been adapted into numerous films and inspired countless horror writers?

That would be Edgar Allan Poe. His works, including "The Fall of the House of Usher," have had a profound influence on literature, particularly in the genres of horror and detective fiction. The dark and macabre themes in his stories continue to captivate audiences and inspire new generations of writers and filmmakers.
